message.body: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <tbl> <auth_type>1</auth_type><!--授权类型1、实时授权 2、预授权--> <!--预授权不显示纳税明细nsmxlistitem、nsjg--> <nsmxlist> <nsmxlistitem> <card_type>201</card_type> <card_no>330201198801011234</card_no> <full_name>姓名1</full_name> <mobile>15012341234</mobile> <tax_date>201608</tax_date> <pretax_income>4000</pretax_income> <!--应纳税额--> <payable_tax_amount>500</payable_tax_amount> <actual_tax_amount>150</actual_tax_amount> <housing_fund>200</housing_fund> <social_security>128</social_security> <withholding_agent>宁波市海曙区海鲜小作坊</withholding_agent> <withholding_agent_address>宁波市海曙区迎风街11号</withholding_agent_address> </nsmxlistitem> <nsmxlistitem> <card_type>201</card_type> <card_no>330201198801011234</card_no> <full_name>姓名1</full_name> <mobile>15012341234</mobile> <tax_date>201608</tax_date> <pretax_income>4000</pretax_income> <!--应纳税额--> <payable_tax_amount>500</payable_tax_amount> <actual_tax_amount>150</actual_tax_amount> <housing_fund>200</housing_fund> <social_security>128</social_security> <withholding_agent>宁波市海曙区海鲜小作坊</withholding_agent> <withholding_agent_address>宁波市海曙区迎风街11号</withholding_agent_address> </nsmxlistitem> </nsmxlist> <nsjg> <deedtax_times>3</deedtax_times> </nsjg> <sjxlist> <sjxlistitem> <column_name>xm</column_name> <column_comment>姓名</column_comment> </sjxlistitem> <sjxlistitem> <column_name>zjlx</column_name> <column_comment>证件类型</column_comment> </sjxlistitem> </sjxlist> <sqqx> <loan_before_yfs>24</loan_before_yfs> <loan_after_yfs>36</loan_after_yfs> <auth_date>2020-08-24</auth_date> <expired_date>2020-08-24</expired_date> <remarkjj>银行产品简介</remarkjj> <product_name>NBYHBLT</product_name> <remark>银行产品详细介绍简介</remark> </sqqx> </tbl>
